title: Stunt Hard
lyrics: I did it all on my own
Turned a chair to a throne
I'm a king in this world
I put my whole city on
To some things that they never would've known
If I didn't
And every night is a premiere
If I ever disappear
Best believe I'm coming back
Got rich, went broke, and got rich again
On that same shit again
All I ever do is stunt hard
You hatin' ass niggas
Wanna be a big thug ass nigga
Talkin' 'bout you pullin' triggers
But you ain't really doin' nothin'
All these raps, that shit sounds like you bluffin'
Man you niggas be lame
You be lookin' at me crazy nigga
Like what's that nigga's name
Nigga it's L-O-C
Comin' straight up out the gutters nigga
U-N-E
Better step your game up
When you fuckin' with me
Man get your game up
I'm comin' real hard nigga
I'm comin' for the title
You niggas ain't shit
Mothafucka I'm comin' for the mothafuckin' title
And I got a big ass rifle
You niggas better move
Cause I move through these lanes like Michael
Man I'm straight out the block
You niggas ain't shit
Dudes like you end up gettin' popped
But forget about the haters
Let's pop a fuckin' bottle
And let's get the fuckin' navigators
Cause you know we fuckin' ballin'
You niggas ain't shit
And all you hoes be callin'
Man I'm livin' the life
And if I come back again
I bet you I can do it twice
It's the mothafuckin' hustle in me
Y'all niggas keep hatin'
Man I'm gonna do me
I did it all on my own
Turned a chair to a throne
I'm a king in this world
I put my whole city on
To some things that they never would've known
If I didn't
And every night is a premiere
If I ever disappear
Best believe I'm coming back
Got rich, went broke, and got rich again
On that same shit again
All I ever do is stunt hard
Man you ain't a boss
If you ain't take a loss
Man I seen the fuckin' struggle
I seen Mama struggle everyday
Tryna bubble
Tryna put a pot plate nigga in her face
I seen the fuckin' AK's blowin' up another nigga's face
Best part of the life
I give a fuck nigga
I don't think twice when it comes to the cheddar
You niggas runnin' your mouth
To me it's whatever
I got the hustle nigga from Moms
I got the attitude from Pops
And I don't give a fuck brah
It's a lesson that I once thought
I been seen it all nigga
You ain't tough
So if you see me nigga come and holla
I show a lot of love nigga
So follow me to the top
And let's get this cash
I told you before nigga
I'm ready to smash
You know it's all good
Man I bring it back nigga
To my neighborhood
It's where we all started
Where we all struggle
And in the game
Man we never fuckin' fumble
We're the winners in this shit
We makin' these stacks
And we takin' it to the next level
Yeah I seen it all man
I seen the fuckin' struggle
Now I'm ready to win
I did it all on my own
Turned a chair to a throne
I'm a king in this world
I put my whole city on
To some things that they never would've known
If I didn't
And every night is a premiere
If I ever disappear
Best believe I'm coming back
Got rich, went broke, and got rich again
On that same shit again
All I ever do is stunt hard
